text: Yang Li (Traditional Chinese: 楊麗; Simplified Chinese: 杨丽; born in Lianyungang, China on 26 February 1993) is a Chinese association football forward who plays for the China women's national football team. She was one of the top scorers in the 2014 AFC Women's Asian Cup. ==Honours== ===Team=== China PR national football team *Four Nations Tournament: 2014, 2016 ===Individual=== *AFC Women's Asian Cup
